description.short:
A structure describing attributes of a video device.

An ofVideoDevice can represent a camera, grabber or other frame source.

methods.name: bAvailable
methods.short: Is true if this video device is available.

A list of video device formats provided by the device.

See also: ofVideoFormat

methods.name: serialID
methods.short: Unique identifier for the device if it has one.

#class ofVideoDevice

<!-- visible: True advanced: False istemplated: False _extends: _ -->

##InlineDescription

A structure describing attributes of a video device.

An ofVideoDevice can represent a camera, grabber or other frame source.
